title: A Brief But Spectacular take on Indigenous cultures and struggles
description: Albert Bender is a writer, activist and attorney of Cherokee descent. Currently based in Tennessee, he has long been an advocate for Native American cultural preservation and justice. He shares his Brief But Spectacular take on Indigenous cultures and struggles. PBS NewsHour is supported by - https://www.pbs.org/newshour/about/funders
